Text:
OK - a great recording, superb quality taken from Sky Sports HD.

V-9.5
A-9.5

My only quibble is that this is a MKV file and would be more useful converted and compressed to a smaller AVI file.

Thanks for the upload, it's much appreciated.
Fantastic!  Any time a Chelsea game shows up is brilliant!  Cheers!

Again thanks Sceneline, this file is great quality but many will not download a 3GB file just to watch it on a netbook.  If you could post a 700MB version as well you could capture both markets.

.
I have the 1080p source from skyhd but with romanian audio i just hope this audio fits my file :D
